mapper.select: select b.qna_board_id qnaBoardId, b.member_id memberId, b.hit hit, b.subject subject, b.content content, b.register_time registerTime, b.secret secret, b.password password, b.is_answered isAnswered, case when m.is_active = 1 then m.nickname else '(탈퇴한 회원)' end as nickname from qna_board b left join member m on b.member_id = m.member_id order by b.qna_board_id desc limit #{start}, #{listsize}
mapper.update: update qna_board set hit = hit+1 where qna_board_id = #{qnaBoardId}
mapper.insert: insert into qna_comment (qna_board_id, member_id, content, depth, comment_group) values (#{qnaBoardId}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{depth}, #{commentGroup})
